place_description: Community centered, family-owned, mercantile & café bar in Downtown Rock Hill, SC.

reviews_data.review_text: Very nice setup. Lots of cool stuff and friendly staff. Will be doing more business with them.

A wonderful space for all! From the DIY bars, to the local artists & unique gifts to the cafe in the back; this The Mercantile has something for everyone! Staff is knowledgeable & kind. A great place to build community.

Perfect spot to grab breakfast, coffee, a cute gift or something for yourself, and even an event space. The team are all so welcoming and ready to help with your needs! Love the Mercs mission and how they are making Rock Hill a better place to live!
Probably a nice place but they host events blasting music until 11 pm which isn't very respectful to the surrounding community
What a fun place! Tons of variety and a bar! The DIY hat bar is so the best! Everyone was super nice. This will be a staple stop whenever we're in Rock Hill.
Great place. The people are so friendly. The flowers are exceptional!
Expensive gifts and not always family friendly.
Fascinating and eclectic store with a deli and bar to boot. Interesting mix of merchandise and very friendly staff. Definitely a great place to stop in and check out the vibe.
Love the variety of yummy pastries.
So much great stuff, fun craft opportunities, and the cafe and bar are fabulous! They even carry non-alcoholic beer!

I can not say enough great things about Katherine at the flower bar. Not only does she make the most fantastic wedding flower arrangements ever; she is also one of the most incredible people you will meet. So if you are ever in the area and just want to look at some amazing flower arrangements or meet a very cool person The Mercantile is the place you should stop.

You ever walk into someone's living room while they had a family dinner ? And they did not know you at all and you were a foreign, unwelcome stranger......?

That's how it felt walking into this store. Not only is it no welcoming to all, you feel like unless you have there beliefs or agree with there philosophy you're not welcome.

I felt so uncomfortable coming here. And then the one worker who spoke was rude and her comments towards me were uncalled for, not friendly, and unwelcoming.

Only come here if you share their exact ideas. And their level of "open mind-ness"

The obsession with blasphemy is a bit weird, one of the shirts that they decide to put up on display the moment you walk in was distasteful. Weird to me when Buddha, allah, Mohammed, or any other religious figure is not joked about or put on display against their teachings. Just Jesus. How can you say you welcome all but so openly display someone's religion in an incorrect way. I'm not in the business of shoving my religion down anyone's throat, I happily walk into black owned, women owned, veteran owned, minority owned, lgbt owned stores with no hesitation. As long as I don't feel unaccepted or threatened. And sadly as a minority, women, but one who just so happens to believe in Jesus, this store just made me uncomfortable. For the type of people to claim violence over anything, this stores displays and associated attitudes illicit violence. The store attendant even made a snarky comment about a street design shirt my sister wore (that happened to have a psalms verse printed on it). This is not very welcoming or accepting in my opinion. The store looks like it could've had potential to sell nice things but after that comment immediately upon entering, I just didn't feel comfortable to look around to much.
Honestly walked in the wrong end of the building to get coffee  but I'm glad I did. This is a very cute eclectic store with several DIY stations.

There is no better place to get married, shop, eat and drink than this place! We had our wedding there this past weekend and I 1000% choose this place over and over again. Brittany and team went BEYOND with every singe detail and aspect of our big day. Brittany, Michael, LoLa, Katherine, Christan and everyone else....THANK YOU!

This place is constantly changing around and upgrading! It's really worth checking out on and off or on a regular basis. For me personally it felt a bit like a boutique but now they've changed it a lot to where it's more of a hang out place with gifts and home goods to buy while you're there. The wine/beer bar is a great addition! I definitely feel like this is a place for people who have $ to spend to go out. If you don't want to spend any $ don't go in there.   There's a high probability that you will want to purchase an item, a beverage or some food. And, now, you can purchase an experience. They set up tables for crafts and they provide the supplies. A really cool and fun new place to hang out.
A 3 star is mostly because many items and services that they offer are not "affordable" for my personal pocket. But overall I think for others, I've noticed that people send off a 4-5 *star vibe. I'm there often at the cafe/coffee shop, I love the vibe and the people. I'm so thrilled that they opened up the place for people to just hang there and offer us some fresh and quality food and drinks. They really are a special bunch and I'm grateful they are here.
This small city really needs a place like this! A local hang out spot with something for everyone. And, they're constantly evolving and thinking of new ideas on how to make things better.
Great shop! I definitely recommend stopping in
A fantastic place! Coffee and tea is always good and it's such a fun location. It always feels so good to shop local! Hoping for a location in Charlotte at some point.
There's a casual, comfortable atmosphere and the staff is great. Coffee is excellent, all the way from the drip to the lattes.

I rented the upstairs space of The Mercantile for my sister's baby shower, and it could not have been more perfect! The space is eclectic and interesting and doesn't need much at all in the way of decorating to be a stunning venue. Brittany was so kind and accommodating and responded to my (many) questions quickly. She was so helpful, sending me pictures as I live out of the area, showing some of my family the space so I could see it over FaceTime, and then allowed me to see upstairs when I randomly stopped by while in town. They have a ton of options as far as food, drinks, tables, decor, most anything you can't think to throw a party; however, there is absolutely no pressure to use them if you have other vendors or prefer to DIY. If you're looking for an incredible and unique venue in Rock Hill with the added benefit of supporting a local business that is doing great things for the local community, you've found the perfect place!
Great place to shop for holiday gifts as there is something for everyone here. The employees are wonderful - very helpful!! Visit every time I'm in town.
Excellent event venue! Good food, good atmosphere.
Always a fun time!
What a great place!!  I loved my experience, especially with Kathryn and Mary !  Do miss Eloise.
Always love stopping by here for coffee and checking out the amazing selection of eclectic goods from clothing, furniture, to flowers.

The most beautiful shop! There is something for anyone and everyone and it's hands down the best place to buy unique gifts. The cafe located inside has amazing coffee, drinks, and food, and the service is top notch. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming and the staff are always so nice and helpful. The owners have hearts of gold and their dedication to the shop and their customers is unmatched. I cannot recommend this place enough.
Love the new location. Great store with lots of unique gifts. Nice coffee, wine bar and deli.

Interesting concept but done many times before. There are a few DIY stations and a coffee shop that make the location more unique but a lot of the items on sale are things that you are going to find on Amazon for cheaper.
Enjoyed the atmosphere! They have some great "crafting" ideas to do.
Pretty cool shop with various gifts and home goods with an attached cafe. Everyone working is the cafe and the gentleman at the front were super friendly.
Great store with a large variety of items for your home. Also sells clothing.
Everyone is so nice, love the events they host and vendor markets!
Love variety but went for meeting this time. It was very informative n helpful
Lots of cool stuff, good coffee and the staff was very helpful.
Always enjoy visiting with out of town guests
Staff is friendly and welcoming. I love the stand with equity and local brands. Appreciate how they support the under privileged.
You will not find a business in Rock Hill that has better owners and employees than The Mercantile. Brittany and Michael pour their heart and soul into their business and the RH community.

I just recently moved here to Rock Hill and was told about this place by a friend. As someone looking for a safe place that is LGBTQ+ friendly I decided to check them out, wow was I in for a surprise. Absolutely highly recommend this place, great stuff to browse, lovely people to talk to, and nice selection of wines n coffees n much more in there Cafe area!
O and they also have some fun events coming up that I'm definitely gonna check out!!
Quiet, calm shop with some unusual items . Upstairs there are tables and seating where you can sit with your computer or read.
Amazing, beautiful, and welcoming environment with great staff!!
I love the vibe here! The staff are the friendliest around, and I loved the unique selection of gifts! I could spend hours in this store. I also recommend visiting the cafe in the back!
How could you not love this store?? They have everything!! The bring love and acceptance to everyone.

I don't know if this is allowed but I had their lavender menace latte this week and that's my name now. Going to the dmv tomorrow.
Anyway great place to get little gifts, coffee and sanity(ish)
Absolutely love this place! Brought my cousin and Aunt who were visiting from CA and they loved it too. This business is an asset to Rock Hill!! Highly recommend a visit and lunch.
Don't waste your money or time at this establishment!
Unique place with instant great vibes. Already have a wishlist.

Mercantile is awesome, should always be on your lists of places to stop in at, especially on the weekends you're spending downtown Rock Hill! Lots of vendor setups, excellent food, coffee - friendly service!
Fun atmosphere with lively merchandise. A cafe in the back although we did not eat there
Really good
Very nice store with lots of stuff to decorate and use in your house and kitchen. They also have a cafe and coffee shop. Their coffees pretty good.
THE spot to shop for gifts, furniture, knick knacks, you name it and The Mercantile has it.
Went looking for souvenir T-shirts and they (as the rest of the Charlotte area) didn't have any. Still, the Mercantile was fun to browse and had many unique items.

They do awesome things for the community! Lovely floral & plant selection. Beautiful candles & just all around cool stuff. It's not cheap, but it's a great place to support. Their cafe is adorable & even serves beer & wine!

The Mercantile is my FAVORITE place to be! I love to shop there for gifts and for myself. They have such an amazing variety of items from clothing, plants, stationary, books, home decor, bath & body, and more. Their cafe & wine bar is super yummy! It's a great place and space to gather with friends. They host a variety of events - I've taken a candle making class and a painting class previously - and there are so many more classes I want to take in the future. They do a lot for the community which is just one of the many reasons I love it so much. Check it out!
Went this past Saturday and WOW did I have fun. I couldn't believe all the goodies they have. I've found my favorite shopping store. If you haven't been you need to go .

This is a great environment to be in when trying to some work done! Friendly staff and tasty food & coffee! :)

P.S. Ella made me write this but it is true.
Very nice store and cafe! The staff is very friendly. I love that this is a dog friendly place, too! Shout out to Olive, always smiling and attentive to customers.

This two-story store is an eclectic mix of clothing, housewares and oddities that you cannot leave without purchasing! The cafe makes great coffees and delicious offerings. But my favorite thing about this place is how they serve the community. They believe in diversity and they challenge the city of Rock Hill and I love it! Kudos! They also put on the best events
Stopped in and visited the Cafe which was great. Ventured into the store part and was surprised at the amount of inventory. Just alittle to pricey for me.
Very small samich
Nice shop, picked up a few things & Cerina was very nice & helpful.
Love all the products and the young lady that works there is so pleasant, friendly and knowledgeable of the products.
Cute eclectic store. Prices reasonable.
Love the mercantile! So many unique items and great coffee!
Nice space with nice crafts, also a heavy social media presence that supports the LGBTQ+ community very well. Will continue to support, great people behind the scenes. Definitely worthy of your $$$!
Well it was a good experience for me but not my sibling. coffee exploded everywhere in those cheap cups
Great, quaint place with very good coffee!
Why is the Mercantile not open on Sunday Monday or Tuesday.  Especially the week of Christmas?

They call themselves a general store. You can get clothing, flowers, food, and gifts here. It's a cool and quirky place. If you're looking for a unique gift for someone this is the place to check out. They have 2 locations close by each other. One has furniture, the other is more of the general store.
Best store ever coffee=perfection

Love the variety of products here! We also got breakfast sandwiches and coffee from the cafe, phenomenal. Also WILL! Amazing customer service, product knowledge, and overall demeanor. Really enjoyed our time browsing around the shop!!
I love this store! They have an  eclectic variety of items for sale! I thoroughly enjoyed shopping there.
Staff is so friendly and I love the unique array of merchandise they have. This business does a lot for those in need so I never feel guilty going over budget at checkout lol
I own a very successful 20 year old coffee shop in another city, and this is one of the best drinks I have had in quite some time. Wonderful drinks and service. Gelina really knows her stuff.
Lovely place to shop for gifts and house goods.  They also have a very nice area for coffee or an adult beverage with friends.
We went to an outdoor play here but will be back. Loads of amazing products.

The Mercantile suggests that the items sold are hand made and local but probably 98% of items are made in China, India and other places but not made locally! I ask one of the workers about wooden spoons, I was told they had and all I was finding were sets made in Chine. The worker showed me some cheap spoons from India and told me that not all their stuff was from China; they occasionally had stuff from as close as Tennessee but that they were waiting on a shipment to come in. BTW I saw the same holiday spatula's at Target being sold for $1.50. These were marked a lot more. The cup I bought last month for my sister for $15 I saw at Ross's for $5.50! Ridiculous! Don't tout that you are local and to buy local unless you do the same.
I love this place! There are so many items to see, lots of great things to own or to give as gifts. I walked through and looked at every single thing, and I loved it all!
I love the philosophy of this place! All are included.
Last time I was there, it was crowded, but I loved it. The workers were so nice.
Absolutely fell in love with this place and it's amazing assortment of wonderful items for everyone. Appreciated their respect for diversity as well. We will be back very soon!
Fabulous store and meeting place.
Very nice store. They have a great selection and the folks that work there are so helpful and fun. The only draw back for me was that it was, in my opinion, very expensive.

The Mercantile bills itself as a modern day general store - and I think that is the perfect description, as they carry a little bit of everything! I appreciate the care and consideration they put into choosing local and sustainably-made items - and I can't wait to come back to create a floral arrangement sometime!
Truly a staple of Rock Hill. Wonderful service, cozy vibes, a wide array of products, and some delicious coffee to top it all off. Will always stop by when I'm in the area!
First visit. Loved it. Something for everyone. My Grands made a terrarium to bring home. Lovely shop. I'll be returning.

Cute space, weird vibes.  I am pretty sure I got dairy instead of paid alternative. My tummy was not happy later. Only tried out because of the rave reviews. Workers seemed stressed/ understaffed especially young brunette, she had to ask for help upfront with two others there. Not sure, service was not genuinely warm. Smiles in showroom, but not cafe.
Go, browse, drink some coffee, look upstairs at the clothes, you will be glad you came.
Love this place and the great atmosphere. The lavender coffee was fabulous also!

This is my favorite local shop and where I always go to get unique, thoughtful, personal gifts. Went to the new location (finally!) today, in fact. As usual, everyone was friendly, helpful, caring, and just plain awesome! I love that this store is in our community and is supportive of ALL people, full stop.
Super friendly,  unique items and spacious.
I always find something to take home every time I come in -- which is pretty often now with the cafe! The staff are wonderful and I especially love all the work the Mercantile does for the community!

Amazing environment, amazing staff, amazing owners, AMAZING store. Whether you looking to just go shopping, get some coffee, or just hang-out, this is the place to go. Rock Hill is so lucky that The Mercantile is apart of its' community.

Always love The Mercantile -- but I just discovered Katherine (the dreamy florist/bouquet whisperer.) She helped us craft gorgeous bouquets for table scape and alter for an intimate wedding. My sister and I were all over the place trying to describe the desires of the excited (but indecisive) bride! Katherine was super patient and came through in a perfect way - AND with a sense of humor - which we *all* needed by the time we worked out the details!! Everyone was blown away by the elegant flowers and I was equally as tickled with the very reasonable price. Go to Katherine for your floral needs - you won't be disappointed!

I cannot express how much I ADORE the little cafe in the Mercantile. The baristas are super friendly and the whole store is such a relaxed environment--with cute little tables and such a nice outdoor area, I could stay for hours! As someone who used to be a barista, I'm very picky about coffee roasts and espresso flavor. The Merc's espresso roast is full-bodied and balanced, super smooth and doesn't have one bit of that syrupy or fishy taste that most coffee shops and big chains have! By far the best coffee I've tried, will make this my ONLY coffee spot! Please give them a try and you'll be hooked!
This is one my favorite places to shop in Rock Hill! So many unique things and they are all good quality. It's a fun atmosphere and the employees are lovely as well.

Amazing little shop in Rock Hill with some of the most eclectic and beautiful items to buy for your home. They have such a variety for home decor, knickknacks, and just awesome stuff. I love the atmosphere and the style of all of the items they are selling. Definitely worth a trip to check them out

My absolute FAVORITE place in Rock Hill! I'm always greeted with the most kind employees, and I could honestly spend hours here. I'm so excited for the HQ to open - helloooo food & coffee! Also, if you're looking for the most amazing flowers, this is your spot. I would leave more stars if I could!

The Mercantile Home store is gorgeous! I rarely go in to a store and find even one piece I like, but everything  in this store is carefully selected and beautifully curated. The textiles are so lovely and so reasonably priced and the art is unique and tasteful. This is the best option for unique, quality, designer home goods in the Rock Hill area.

The Mercantile Home store is a gem in Rock Hill. Not only can you get inspiration to redo your home, you also make some amazing connections with the people who work and own the store. Cant wait to get the mirror I've been desiring!!! Thank you Merc Home for being such a unique space that Rock Hill has needed for much time :)
The best gem in the city
Would have liked to shop and spend money but not going to wear a mask. Will spend money elsewhere.

This shop is something special. The staff is amazing and the selection offers something for everybody.  It's even more special the connection to community and the mission of the business. Wish I could give 10 stars! Can't wait to visit again!

I want to give it five stars but it's frustrating that a business that says they're for the everyone in community does not carry clothing sizes that are size inclusive. I would love to be able to shop here for cute clothing pieces like my friends but per usual with boutiques/stores like this I'm relegated to only being able to buy accessories.
Indie shops are always cool. Local shop with original 1800's flooring and original products. Awesome customer service!
Seems to be a shrine to Marxist and Socialists, whom I assume the ownership approves. Won't be spending any money here.

Stumbled across this place and enjoyed the vibe. The shop/general store was very welcoming , had a great cup of coffee and will be going back to enjoy the brewery and food truck in the near future. One of Rock Hill's hidden gems !
Cutest store ever!!! I can spend hours there.  Amazing customer service, it's my go to for original gifts.

This is a business that is truly invested in the community. Putting on a pride event in rock hill was a risk they decided to take, and it was so worth it! I love visiting all the Warehouses on White businesses, and I'll be supporting the Mercantile as much as possible in the future!
Will never visit this place.... again...
Love this place! Great workshops and instructors!
Incredible experience! I can't say enough good things about the staff, product, workshops! Love shopping here and will continue to support all they do!

Super cute products in a super supportive environment. Thank you for hosting pride events and being true leaders in your community! Takes special people in lead the charge in a place like Rock Hill. Thank you, thank you!

A great addition to downtown, with some very unique items, many locally made, and a friendly staff. They also sponsor a community fridge for people in need. And lastly, they are located next door to a local brewery, so prepare to do some shopping and grab a beer afterward.

I am beyond thankful that Rock Hill has this amazing shop. This is my go to spot for gifts and cute things for my own home. The customer service is amazing and shopping is always such a positive experience. If you're looking for something special for yourself or someone in your life- do yourself a favor and check this place out!

Love, love, LOVE this shop! I come in here every other weekend and have to exercise so much restraint to not buy everything. I come here when I need to pick up gifts, they have curated some of the most unique and different products so I always leave with more than I came for. This is my one stop shop for home decor too.  The staff is always super kind and welcoming to us and are super sweet to our baby. I also love that they are inclusive in this community - if you have a problem with that, you do not have to shop here but please keep your negativity to yourself and leave more Mercantile goodies for the rest of us who support a forward thinking Rock Hill

I've lived in Rock Hill since 1997 and it's so refreshing to see open minded humans making long overdue changes in our community. Everyone deserves love and support and to feel seen. I'm so amazed at the strong and brave women who run this business.

And they have the cutest stuff in their amazing shop. Seriously anything from coffee mugs to chocolate and kitchen wares !

Well behaved women rarely make history, remember that miss Brittany. Thank you for doing what is right and always standing up in the face of adversity. Xoxo- your friends at Spa Forte

Horrible service. I've purchased hats from here in the past, won't be shopping here again. Not sure who it was that this issue occurred with but she literally followed us around the store and asked us to leave a few minutes before the scheduled closing time. I have worked in retail for many years and I have never been treated or treated a customer like this. If your listed hours are on the door, and your customer enters the store before the scheduled closing time, you don't ask them to leave before they are done shopping, much less before the scheduled closing time because you want to go home. Not sure this review will do any good considering the owner will just disregard like she has with every other poor review and claim the patron must be mistaken and thinking of a different store.
Thank you so much for being an inclusive space in our community! I've bought several items from here in the past and will continue to do so in the future!!

This world needs more shops like The Mercantile. They embody community in every way possible. They create a welcoming space for everyone. May I emphasize, everyone! I have been going to this shop since opening and knew from the beginning that it was an addition to Rock Hill that it was missing. It's truly hard to not go in the Mercantile and not buy something lol. The main resource I use the Mercantile for is when I have no idea what to get someone and am in need of purchasing a gift. I know this store has received a lot of backlash recently that they don't deserve. And just wanted to stop by and show some love! You guys are setting a trend in our community and couldn't be more proud to live a mile away.
Friendly
Very quick to respond when I emailed about the Makers Market!
Great atmosphere, friendly people and fun products!
We absolutely love the Mercantile! They have such unique items and we love getting fresh flowers!
Great friendly place who cares about the community
A lovely store with some incredible finds and a welcoming, energetic staff, who you can chat with (or will leave you alone if that's what you want!)

The owner is rude.
Unprofessional
They do not honor returns

It's a great "a little bit of everything and more" kind of store. Very local and a awesome customer service. Very friendly and filled with many nice and unique things. Perfect for that " I don't know what to give" kind of situation, to find something.
Great shop. Like an upscale General Store.
Love this shop - so many amazing gifts! Doesn't hurt that the staff are so warm and friendly. Perfect place to peruse and support local!

The Mercantile is a gem in Rock Hill! If you need a unique gift for yourself or a friend, this is the best place. The owners are great! Let's keep supporting small, local businesses, y'all Especially one that gives back to the community SO much!
The Mercantile is a beautiful, community minded shop with a large variety of products. Shopping there is always exciting, and I often leave wondering why I don't visit weekly.
Every gift I bought this holiday season came from The Mercantile.  Love how they support our community and making unity a priority. Support your local merc!

I absolutely love this store. Besides the items in the store being amazing, their best asset is their AMAZING staff. The owners created such a wonderful culture here and it's reflected by the wonderful folks working there. You will not leave the merc unhappy. It's the best ever.

Love this place! After several friends had recommended Mercantile to me, I finally went and was not disappointed. The staff was friendly and someone even took the time to walk the store and help me find gifts before Christmas. Will definitely keep shopping here!
Super cute store and the friendliest service!! I bought a really nice bracelet from there and I'm obsessed with it. Definitely will be coming back!

I LOVE THIS SHOP SO MUCH. Every time I go, I have to literally drag myself out because I could easily spend hours upon hours in there. Staff is always so sweet and helpful, I feel like I'm apart of their family - even if our exchanges are short. I always find the coolest and most fun items when I'm there! Christmas shopping was a breeze this year because of the Merc! I'm not kidding when I say I have dreams where I am mindlessly walking in the store, and when I wake up I am sad that I am not actually there (LOL). I could go on and on about how much I love them - so please do yourself a favor and check it out yourself! (:

Seriously - RUN! Don't walk and get there as soon as you can! I'd like to consider The Mercantile as my home away from home. I wish I were joking. But seriously, from the candles and wax melts in my home to my soaps, my seasonings and (all of) my decorations, you will find items that I got from this cute store.
And it's incredible because I'll say, "this is my idea," and they take it and they make it so much better. My house smells like yankee but with small business sourced products that won't harm your body and could be featured in a Pinterest photo. But not because of me, because of these people!

Don't get me started on the gift choices, the seasonal options, the wine and coffee selection, the freaking community fridge?! I really could go on.

Incredible staff, incredible options, incredible place.
Literally the best store ever. Love it and the people who work there!

The Mercantile is a GEM in Rock Hill. Nicest staff you'll ever meet. They have hilarious gag gifts, fun things to eat, and beautiful kitchen items. They are continually planning new events and programs in the community. I hope Rock Hill continues to grow in this direction, with businesses being connected, intentional, and inclusive.
Horrible service. Owner is rude. I highly suggest you never visiting or purchasing from them.

Absolutely love The Mercantile! Wonderful store to find that perfect gift! I have always been greeted with a smile. My only problem when I go into the Mercantile is that I do not want to leave! Do yourself a favor and visit The Mercantile!
We've heard so many great things about this shop and they were all true!!! Such a neat shop!!
Best gift shop in the area.  Such a fun assortment of unique things.  The flower bar is my favorite!
Thanks for supporting Democracy and being a good person!
Good assortment of home decor items

What a cute old- fashioned little store.  They have such unique items,  many locally made.  The biggest thing that I love is their support for the community,  with the Community Refrigerator.  Thank you!
The pazzia was solo small and the bread was cold
the best customer service and huge selection of items!!! my favorite place to find gifts
Love this store. So much to look at! Great gifts for Christmas for sure!
Great place for 1 of a kind gifts!
Loved the unusual and amazing items.  I will definitely be coming back soon!
Beautiful little shop! Extremely inclusive and welcoming. They have great novelty gift items, beautiful home decor, bath & body products, and a great flower section. Such a great find!
Fun shop with awesome staff! If you are looking for some unique things for yourself or for a gift I highly recommend this place. They also have super cute locally handmade masks.
Warm and welcoming people great place for souvenirs and trinkets.

awesome store,  great place!!!
Hosts community fridge,  that is a wonderful thing they do.
Cool store. Unique items. And they host the community fridge.  Help fill it up.
This is a very nice store.   It has a variety of items.  Gifts for yourself or family and friends.  Go and check it out.
What a fantastic place that feels like home. The staff is great, very friendly a helpful.
Such a delightful place; friendly, helpful and so many unique items. I bought two gifts for my sister-in-law

I ordered a hand selected "self care" gift for my mother for Mother's Day since I could not go shopping myself. My mother and I had gone shopping at the Mercantile together when she visited for Thanksgiving so I thought some items from here would be a great gift! The items they selected arrived beautifully packaged and were just right lovely things- a nice soap, beautiful lotion, rooms spray, bath salt, and a lip gloss. It was a great value and my mother loved it! The mercantile has lovely things and this idea of hand picked gift baskets during social distancing times was such a great idea!
Great customer service!! Very cool items! Went in for 1 item came home with 3 !!

Oh my goodness. This store is like a little piece of heaven in an area that is growing and developing.
They had such cute gifts and products  That I wanted to buy everything there. The staff was friendly and very helpful. The store with clean and laid out really nice. I loved that they featured local vendors and supported a lot of local artist and businesses.
WOW!  This is a beautiful shop filled with a fabulous variety of thoughtfully curated items!  This shop is a "must visit" if you're looking for a special gift.
Great store with enthusiastic owners , native to the community.
One of my favorite places. Lots of one of a kind items you cant find other places
What a great little store! Their branding is great and they have excellent service. I got a lot of cool Christmas presents from here.
Really charming shop with things that would make excellent gifts. The stuff in the back section will give you a good laugh.
Awesome collection of home goods, fantastic service and amazing staff.
Lot's of neat stuff here!
Great ambiance, open door, welcoming.
Love this local shop! Lots of great choices for your home or gifts!
I'll always be a huge fan of new small businesses in Rock Hill; this one just didn't happen to have anything I was interested in. Lots of craft goods

So happy to have stumbled upon this little gem. A store like this will bring new energy to the area. I will love supporting them, especially come Christmas time. I purchased a quirky guest book for my home - something unique, fun, different, not anything you will find in a big box store.
Great service and variety of products!

Super cute place. It's like a home goods, but with more personalized and more inventory. They have lots of different items, things you didn't even know you needed! You could easily spend hours just roaming the store! I love coming here to see what new products they have and to support local businesses! Very very cute place, I love going here!
Neat store, nice owners
Great place.  Lots of unique gifts.  Would highly recommend.
Groovy  cool

I enjoyed my visit to The Mercantile!  It's a great place to find gifts and and something for yourself or your home! I especially appreciated the quality of the children's book section, touches of humorous merchandise and the seasonal items.
Unique shopping experience. Great place to find unusual gifts. Love the Mercantile!

Beautiful store. I stumbled upon the store Saturday waiting for car repairs. I am so glad I did. Employees were friendly and helpful.  Best tea towel selection with funny sayings. I can't wait to come back next Saturday when I have more time to shop.
Love this store. Reminds me of Anthropologie. Has become my favorite store!
Great place
This place is AMAZING!! I love looking at all the different items, and talking to the employees.  They all are super friendly and so helpful.
Pricey for the products.  Fresh flowers were nice.  Back room is NOT appropriate for small children.  Adult area.
Cool Place

Visited yesterday and fell in love! Rock Hill really needed a store like this. They have little bit of everything and it is a beautiful space and set up. I love shopping at small businesses that are family owned and I will definitely return and continue to shop there and support this business!
Very friendly store!
If you want a unique gift....this is the place!  A really fun store to visit!!
Love this place, have so many really nice eclectic things for your home.
Wonderful store with very unique items, fresh flowers, great prices and very friendly.
LOVE this store!! Such an eclectic collection of gifts for all ages. The store is beautiful and we LOVE the owners and their team. This store is a MUST if you're in Rock Hill, SC.
Love!
The Mercantile is exactly what Rock Hill needed!! No matter what you are looking for they have it!!! I highly recommend you check this place out
Great Shop! Interesting finds and excellent prices! Check em out!
Very helpful and friendly staff, many unique items and beautiful fresh flowers!

Everyone should come down to the Mercantile to shop. Such a great atmosphere to be in. There's something for everyone. You can find great gifts for weddings, baby showers, and just a simple "just because". You will definitely leave with a Smile.
Excellent place to shop with wonderful staff
